subject: Hey checking on my pedal
description_text:
Yerr checking on my pedal 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Marquise Bethea,  Could you please provide your order number? Also, if you're experiencing any issues with the pedals or software, it would be helpful if you could share a video or photo so we can assist you more effectively.

I already have the throttle and brake pedals from your company . I just
need the pedal not even the box but please send the box if it come with it
.


On Mon, Jun 23, 2025 at 10:08 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Marquise Bethea,    This order is correct, it does not include the control box which needs to be ordered separately.

It says control box right there in the description but ok I have one
already . Please help with the tracking the china to us shipping stopped
after it landed in  jfk

On Tue, Jun 24, 2025 at 7:19 AM service@simsonn.com
